{{template domain:$$domain name:$$name}}

{{actions:
- display: Install
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/disable
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - reason

- display: New Instance
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/enable
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - reason
}}
